website_summaries.verdict: Full-figured women can get the coverage they need with this highly-rated strapless bra, featuring a stable design and smooth, sleek appearance.
pros: Users are pleased that it runs true to size, even with the larger cups
many who have never been able to wear a strapless before have found this one a success
Includes detachable straps to let the wearer convert to halter, crisscross, and one-shoulder styles
cons: Can run a bit tight for those not used to wearing a strapless
Some don't like the placement of the underwire, feeling it's too low

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: As a solidly non-perky 36G lady, I've never felt confident wearing strapless. This bra KILLED it this summer. Must have worn this the whole summer with all the cute halter necks that were in style. Just buy the bra. It was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: defies physics
customer_reviews.text: oh my god. it actually stays up. I'm blown away. I'm a 42 D, my boobs are huge, I've never had a strapless bra that could overcome their elephantine weight. I can finally wear off the shoulder things and stuff with tiny straps. Oh my god. This is the most expensive bra I've ever bought but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra !!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST strapless bra I have ever purchased . I am a 36DD and find it challenging to find one that fits this well . Great price, great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless bra for big, heavy DDD's!
customer_reviews.text: This bra literally stayed up all night. I wasn't able to wear it out, oh, but I wore it to work all night for a 12 hour shift. I work at a really busy hospital. Not once did it slide down. It held my babies up all night. I've attached a few pics so you guys can see. Y'all, mothers, weight loss sisters, and just overall saggy booby sisters, THIS is it boo! FINALLY! I can't wait until this covid 19 crap is over, I'm ready to get out cheaaa! 😆😆
customer_reviews.author: Lavetta Thomas

customer_reviews.title: i'l rather buy it from MACYS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra in white from Macys over a years ago and it is still going strong, firm and nicely fitted. I decided to buy it in black but it was out at Macys so I ordered it from this vendor. 6 months later, I am not sure if i got a bad batch or maybe this is a knockoff Wacoal . When i received it, I thought it was a bit loose compared to the one i purchased from Macys. One of the hook is broken , the top part of the bra cup folds out and you can see the line under my cloth.. I basically cannot wear it again. Thats almost $70 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Ferins Touch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bra was $78 and the reviews were phenomenal. I wore it one time and the wire broke and was digging into my sternum for hours before I could change. Absolutely do not buy this bra. I’m completely appalled at the poor manufacturing. Wore it once and it fell apart. Complete waste of money and I’m absolutely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxa Rind

customer_reviews.title: ... for the price but let me say it fits perfect. I am a size 38C and after having ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say i was a little skeptic in buying this bra especially for the price but let me say it fits perfect. I am a size 38C and after having three kids umm yea my breast are lets just say not up there where they should be lol. This bra holds them up and in place..
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cups runneth over
customer_reviews.text: Band fit great and was comfortable. BUT to achieve any kind of lift, these push your chest all the way up and over no type of top support. They’re like a demi cup, I assume for lower cut clothing? What this means is that if you are large chested (DD+) you will prob look like a buxom serving wench like I did. Everything pushes up, & together, & “jiggles.” There’s no way I could have bent over in this, let alone walked, turned around, or danced. Tried 2 sizes and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arendt

customer_reviews.title: Like 40 DDD big
customer_reviews.text: I've got huge boobs. Like 40 DDD big. I've always wanted a strapless bra but I've never had one that holds my boobs securely where they're supposed to be! I Googled "best strapless bras for big tits" and my god did Google deliver. I wear it all the time even when I'm not wearing a strapless dress/top because it gives my shoulders a rest from holding these bad boys up all day. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: I've actually been wearing it pretty much everyday for over a month now
customer_reviews.text: Ok so with having a C/D cup I was a major skeptic because as we all know it's impossible to find a strapless bra that actually does the job in that cup range. Then the price was a little mind boggling but I tried it anyway knowing I could return it for free. Ladies this bra is legit !! I've actually been wearing it pretty much everyday for over a month now. I'm definitely going to be ordering another color !!
customer_reviews.author: PBF

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!  This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: 1 million stars! As a natural 32g post 4 kids and approaching 40, I NEVER, EVER, NOT IN MY WILDEST DREAMS thought there was a strapless bra out there for me. I've tried every one that had good reviews for large chested ladies but they were all a flop. I've been looking into getting a lift so that I can wear cute summer tanks and sun dresses. This bra worked. It didn't just "do the job" it has exceeded all expectations. I love it. No sagging, excellent support, and a beautiful shape. I ordered another one. I'm so excited for summer now and I am going to cancel my lift and save a few thousand dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: Best bra ever! Wear it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra to go with a strapless dress on a leap of faith after reading reviews online. So glad I did! Best bra I have ever owned! I'm in my forties and have tried many different bras from Nordstrom Rack to Target and have never come across a more comfortable strapless bra. It's so comfortable I can wear it all day long. It's my go to bra with t-shirts and blouses. I find I wear it more then my other black bras because you cannot see the bra outline in the front with shirts and dresses. Definitely going to buy another black and a nude bra.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mtn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered this bra in a different size and the fit was very off, so I sent it back and reordered it at a smaller size and the fit is still off. The bra doesn't stay put, it does nothing for breast shape or support, the quality is worse than some bras I've seen at Walmart, and the straps are basically useless because they are horrifically uncomfortable. I'd never order another bra from this manufacturer ever again. Don't waste your money!! I feel robbed.
customer_reviews.author: halon

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen larger busted ladies rave about how flattering and comfortable the wacoal red carpet strapless bra is, and I knew this wasn’t the correct one right when I put it on. It was EXTREMELY uncomfortable, and the tag says nothing about it being the “red carpet” bra. It also has 3 rows of closures, when the real one should only have 2. Returning it unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bra for large breasts!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this bra! I got a 36DDD even though I normally wear a 36DD. It fits great! I think I should probably be wearing this size on a regular basis. The bra stays up GREAT. The only time I have any problems is if I've been wearing it ALL DAY, it will start to dig in at the bottom underwire area a little bit and is slightly uncomfortable. BUT- that's only with like 10+ hours wear. If I just put this on for a night out, there's zero discomfort and I don't have to constantly grab and pull at it. It's really great for large breasts!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Howell

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 for comfort and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a strapless bra to wear the off the shoulder and small strap blouses. I had one many years ago but found it to be very uncomfortable so didn't think I would find one that would be easy to wear. Before I ordered this bra I researched and found this particular bra seemed to be very popular and it had great reviews for fit and comfort. I have worn this bra a few times and find it very comfortable and the fit is perfect. It also stays put and doesn't slide up or down. I recommend this bra for all those new styles and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I could ever wear a strapless bra with such big boobs
customer_reviews.text: I was WILDLY skeptical about buying a bra online when I never know if I'll fit a 36DDD or 34G. I went with my instincts and got the 34G since that's my current bra I own and OH MY GOSH! Just like all the other reviews, this bra is THE BEST. To have a bra for my big girls that 1) feels super secure 2) doesn't create boob overflow 3) also doesn't create back spillage is a gift from the heavens. Full disclosure: I haven't worn this bra for a full day. I literally just put it on and fell in love to write this review right now. I'll update again if necessary after wearing for a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Joy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first.... but stretched out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it near the end of last summer. Quality of materials and how made are all good. Was a great fit at first, but after just a couple of months, it became really stretched out and how it doesn't fit properly like it did in the beginning. Big disappointment for a high priced bra. It's now worthless to me after only really 3 months of use. I'm a 36B, btw. Doubt I'd buy again - now I'm on the hunt, once again, for a good strapless bra that doesn't slip down or gap. Seems nearly impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Greene

customer_reviews.title: This is the best freaking bra!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best strapless bra I have ever owned. Hands down. I honestly gave up on finding a good one once I hit a G cup. It pulls in and shapes wonderfully. It is a bit padded, which I normally don’t like, but it keeps my boobs looking perky throughout the day and isn’t too heavily padded. I honestly might buy a second one for the summer. Also, I normally HATE Walcoal bras, just because the cuts usually feel a bit prudish for me. However this is just a really good strapless bra. No complaints! Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra from Amazon, and another from Dillard's here at my local mall. I bought them to replace the one I currently have which is the same brand and model. The one from Amazon fits a little differently than the one from the Mall. Again, same brand, same model/design. But this is one uncomfortable. I thought maybe the packaging is different because the one at the mall was already hanging on a hanger instead of being in a package for God knows how long... Maybe it needed to be broken in. Nope. I throw a little pout tantrum every time I have to put it on because it's that uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nefertiti

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and stays put.
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I'm not a fan of strapless bras, especially in my size (38DD), but sometimes you just need one. This one fit me true to size and has a wide 3"+ band with silicone gripping strips that make it feel stable and keep it in place. The only downside is that the top of the cup edge shows as a line through a clingy top, or at least that's how it fits for me. But with most regular fit tops, it doesn't show at all. It's on the pricier side, but I feel like I got what I paid for. All in all, a good & purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Great with straps, not without.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36G. Save your money. At the end of the day, I still have not found a strapless bra that will hold my girls up. It's just not possible. This bra is sexy and great with the straps on, but without them you will be adjusting all day long. That is uncomfortable and inconvenient. Especially hate being sore from a long day with a strapless bra on. Put your money towards sports tape. It will hold all day (gravity defying!) until you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Support for Bigger Breasts
customer_reviews.text: Needed a strapless bra that will hold my 36DDD (36F) breasts for my wedding, and these do just that. Outstanding support while moving, grooving, and just going about the day - and DOES NOT SLIDE DOWN. In terms of material, there is little lining (very thin) at the cups, so they won’t push up your girls, but there is boning and sticky adhesive at the edges. At first, they look and feel a little cheap for the price, but the support is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaninta Hill

customer_reviews.title: ...maybe a new favorite strapless!
customer_reviews.text: So, it passed my initial test drive of trying on a few different tops with it (bending, lifting arms etc.) ...so keeping! I'll update after wearing it for a day, so far so good. I did size down, normally 36C to 34C, and appreciate that I can go tighter for less slipping if needed. Doesn't seem to accentuate any side or back fat so far... hoping it works. Love the color, Wacoal pecan for me is close to desert sand from Victoria's Secret.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found It
customer_reviews.text: So 5 years ago I bought a bra from Younkers and it was my favorite bra ever. It is starting to wear after 5 years of use. I have never had a bra last that long... anyways, I searched and searched and searched for the same bra to replace it and I finally found it! This is the best bra ever and worth every penny. High quality and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: Buy the bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra lived up to the hype. I read through the reviews extensively and decided to purchase to see if this was the answer to my strapless needs. It is DEFINITELY worth the price. I am a 34 C 1/2 in Third Love bras so I got the 34 C in this one and it was 100% perfect. It stays up all day and you don’t need to adjust more than once or twice in a full 8-10 hour day. No cup overflow if you get the right size. I recommend this to everyone. I’m just annoyed I didn’t find this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prime Wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bra in 2 sizes since I was unsure of how they'd fit. I'm 5'5" and 130-135 pounds and generally a 34D. I purchase these bras in a 32C and 32D through Amazon's Prime Wardrobe. The 32C was entirely too small, probably should've expected that, I ended up returning it. The 32D fit great. The cups are adequate size and the band wasn't too loose. I've worn this strapless bra a few times and like that it stays up! It's very comfortable and allows me to wear a variety of tops/dresses without visible bra straps.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRA EVER
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! A strapless bra that holds up the girls!!!! I hate strapless bras and because of that, I don't wear strapless anything. I had a wedding to attend and did some serious research. I figured I'd be disappointed again, but let's give it a whirl. I'm a big chested woman. I wear a 40DD. After two kids, my girls just don't stay where they belong. Not only is this bra COMFORTABLE, it stays in place. I wasn't tugging at it all night. My boobs weren't drooping. And best of all, when I got home afterward, no indentations in my skin from wearing a vice grip. Best investment, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support for larger sizes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bra for my daughter to wear under her prom dress from the recommendation of a well endowed friend. I measured her and ordered according to the chart, 40 DDD. It fit perfectly and provides excellent support. She said she could actually run normally without holding her chest in this without the straps. We will be ordering more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bengal Babe

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown!
customer_reviews.text: This is not what you receive as it is shown. It does not have any material underneath as it shows. It shows about a good inch underneath your breast. THE BRA does not have this. Therefore, it cuts in on us larger breasted women. It is no better than a $10 strapless bra from Walmart on the rack! do not buy. For $65 it should be a better quality and look as it is shown. I do not suggest buying!! I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: marlene vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job and open up new options for dressing for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36DD and just didn't think I could wear this extreme "cold shoulder" look. This is really a great bra, because it has latex or something along the edges that help hold it (and you) in place. Removable, respositionable straps are great additions.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Ivell

customer_reviews.title: Not the Greatest for Me
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like writing a bad review about a Wacoal bra. Generally speaking, they're very good. This one, however, fit poorly and was very uncomfortable, almost to the point of being painful. I realize we're all a bit different in terms of fit, but this Wacoal style is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Old Baguette

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading it was the “best strapless bra ever” because I had an old front closure strapless bra that was too loose. I didn’t realize it had straps and was so versatile, otherwise I would’ve returned it immediately. One reviewer said to wear it several times to get adjusted to it, so that’s what I’m trying to do, but I don’t love it. It seems to run small and digs in, so hopefully it becomes more comfortable over time. I wish I would’ve ordered a size higher in the band. When I wear it strapless, it feels like it’s always slipping even though it’s very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: ladies, forget this if you're larger than a H cup
customer_reviews.text: The rave reviews led me to to believe that perhaps this would fit in the largest size cup. Not even close! I'm 34J US, ordered the 34H, it didn't even come close to fitting. It seems to be well made. Finding large cup strapless continues to be almost impossible...
customer_reviews.author: unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: I had put off buying this for a few years. When I was a smaller band size, the whole bra felt too overwhelming but I have since been more interested in firm-support bras. I wear a 34G but bought a 34DDD. I had tried it on in a local department store and the 3D size was the better fit. I wouldn't necessarily order down but I am sort of in-between those sizes to begin with. It gives a nice lift and cleavage and seems comfortable. Go with this bra to begin with- it's a staple for a reason!
customer_reviews.author: Phhayes

customer_reviews.title: DotVol is just as nice for almost 1/3 of the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought both this bra and the DotVol strapless bra. I am not denying that this is a super nice strapless bra but it wasn’t much different than the one I purchased that was almost 1/3 of the price. The Wacoal is slightly grippier but not enough to justify the huge price difference. I’ve worn the DotVol twice now, for 6+ hours each time and never had to pull it up once. Save yourself the money and get the DotVol!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: And while I really liked this one
customer_reviews.text: I am a die hard Wacoal wearer for their support with larger busted women. And while I really liked this one, I had ordered another at the same time for literally less than 1/2 the price that I can still use the straps without them being seen. I am a firm believer that if you already have a large bust, why would you want padding (which is the ONLY reason I gave 4 starts instead of 5) unless you're either embarrassed or worried someone may take notice to visible signs of temperature change, lol. I didn't want to return it but I needed too as I wouldn't have worn it any other tie other than for my wedding in October.
customer_reviews.author: DJRakyta

customer_reviews.title: Cups seem to run small
customer_reviews.text: Cups seem to run small. Bought my normal size that works in other brands, and the gore was like a whole inch away from tacking to my sternum. The cups cut into the tops of my breasts a bit giving them that awkward strapless bra profile. But... it’s not easy to find strapless bras in an H cup so I’m probably just gonna keep it and make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I took the time to read many of the reviews. I normally wear a 34D but based on the reviews I ordered 34D, a 32D and a 32DD. Until recently I didn’t know that the cup size is different with each band size. I was amazed the 32DD fit me really well. Gravity has taken its toll and I can’t believe how well this strapless bra lifts! I even put on a tight t-shirt and my profile is quite perky! Haven’t worn it yet but so far I’m impressed and I’m writing this in appreciation of all the ladies who took the time to post a review. Really helped my decision process.
customer_reviews.author: Tebby1

customer_reviews.title: Holding high
customer_reviews.text: After two babies, I haven’t worn a strapless bra for over 9 years. Not because I didn’t want to, but because none held me up. This bra is amazing. I felt secure & fairly comfortable. I read they ran small in rib area, so ordered a 34 vs. 32. It’s a bit too loose- but still held me up. I’m a dd.. with mostly sagging lumps. (Maybe too honest) highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Zuzelski

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing! I was skeptical for purchasing this for two reasons: 1. I have a large bust and haven’t been able to find anything comfortable in a long time and 2. I did my own measurements according to the chart. This bra has already given me the support I need (the bra stays in place!) and confidence to wear a lot of the shirts I haven’t worn in a while. Fantastic and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Not a true push-up strapless; made me look flat
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT purchase, instead go try them on at Macy’s. I’m a 34DD and this bra flattened my girls out w zero cleavage (almost like a minimizer bra). However, with inserts you can create your own push-up. It is NOT worth $65 and I only purchased because of the positive reviews. I could get the same style of unflattering bra for 14 dollars at Marshall’s.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: Sizing guide was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bra but way oversize for me. It was recommended that I go up a size and I shouldn't have. If anything I could have gone down a size. The cups on the 38DD could hold two small children. Nicely made, lovely colour and looks like it would give good support. I'm sad it doesn't fit. Once again, it would be cheaper to raise the Titanic than send it back to the US for a replacement. Why is shipping to Australia so freaking expensive when I know that my cousins in the UK don't get charged like we do to go roughly the same distance. Are American suppliers aware that we are actually on the same planet as them?
customer_reviews.author: S. A. M. Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been able to find a strapless bra that I love...until now! I was hesitant to purchase this at first because it seemed a little pricey for bra that I wasn’t planning on wearing often. I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. I’m so glad I did, it is the most comfortable, supportive bra. I’ve worn it to a couple different concerts and it held everything in place, comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great underwire bra for any size
customer_reviews.text: I am not remotely plus sized. I am 5’6” 125 lbs and I take a 32C in this bra. I am usually a 34 but the 32 pulls me in a little tighter. This is the perfect strapless bra for anyone who needs underwire lift and support. It has straps that are removable and adjustable which is great for one-shoulder tops and dresses. Keep in mind that a D cup or larger in this bra has a wider (double rows of hooks) band than a C cup (single row of hooks)
customer_reviews.author: britishcolonialgirl

customer_reviews.title: Red Carpet Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36D. I have large breasts and they are real. They need support. Does this bra hold the girls up? No. Am I disappointed? Yes. If you're seeking the standard strapless bra that is uncomfortable, doesn't stay up and makes wearing that cute strapless dress a nightmare, this is your bra. Don't believe the rave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: oslpod

customer_reviews.title: SO UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: FIRST, BUYER BEWARE, CAN'T RETURN AFTER 30 DAYS. MOST THINGS ON AMAZON YOU CAN RETRUN , NO LIMIT, SO I DIDN'T REALIZE I COULDN'T RETURN THIS AND NOW I'M STUCK WITH A VERY EXPENSIVE VERY UNCOMFORTABLE BRA THAT I COULDN'T EVEN WEAR TO THE PARTY I WAS GOING TO B/C IT WAS SO SO UNCOMFORTABLE. I DON'T KNOW WHAT OTHER BUYERS WERE TALKING ABOUT SAYING ITS THE BEST STRAPLESS BRA, IT'S HORRIBLE. SO TIGHT , HORRIBLE UNDERWIRE, I COULDN'T WEAR IT MORE THEN 5 MINUTES!!! VERY DISAPPOINTED AND WISH I COULD RETURN!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large busted?  This bra fits!!  Stays up all day!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this is a wonderful bra! Being large busted I have never been able to find a strapless bra that stays up and is comfortable. This one was recommended by a YouTuber I watch but she doesn't have large breasts so my expectations still weren't high. Wow is all I can say. It stays up all day, it's comfortable and it's a good bra using it every way! Cups are a tiny bit large when I wear it strapless but I honestly think it's just the way I'm shaped. Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bra, but only when the straps are on
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite bra, but only when the straps are on. This is an extremely comfortable, perfect, true to size, fitting bra. So much so I'm ordering more today to add to my collection. While I could see this being a great strapless, it is way better than others I've tried, it will never out rank the Wonderbra Magic Hands strapless bra in my experience. So if you looking for an awesome strapless, go Wonderbra, if you looking for a 2nd best strapless this is the one for you. Like I said I still think this is a #1 bra with the straps on, so don't hesitate to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I can never find a plus-size strapless bra that doesn't either slide down or dig in and create some very unflattering back rolls. This isn't a miracle bra--it does slide down slightly after movement (i.e., long walks or dancing at a wedding) but it's the best strapless bra I've ever owned in terms of comfort, not sliding down too much, and actually providing support. I plan to buy one in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra for girls with big girls
customer_reviews.text: I now have this bra in two colors and I am here to back up all the other great reviews. I wear a 40G and this is the first supportive straplessbra I have ever found. It's comfortable, it is convertible to a criss cross and regular bra as well and it is just really well made as Wacoal makes really good bras. My only comment is that the Pecan is much darker than it appears in the photo on Amazon. I think it is well suited to someone with a dark complexion but it's too dark to be tan and not dark enough to be brown. An odd color.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Strapless bra, awesome
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! This is the most form fitting perfectly fitting most comfortable least annoying bra I have ever bought. I have been going years Without wearing certain shirts because strapless bras are so bad. This was worth every penny. I’ve never spent that much on a bra but it was well worth it. Stays in place, you can’t see it and you close it’s very nice and smooth. I would give it six stars out of five
customer_reviews.author: Debi L. Nau

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 34D...and this bra really is as good as everyone says
customer_reviews.text: This bra really is as good as everyone says. I'm a 34D and I seldom have to adjust it while wearing it. Come to think of it, I adjust the straps on my regular bras more than I adjust *anything* about this bra. That said, I probably wouldn't wear this bra two days in a row. It wouldn't surprise me if the silicone would start to irritate my skin if I did that. I originally bought this bra in black, and I've decided to buy it in nude as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate! This is THE comfortable one!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a strapless bra could be both supportive and comfortable?! This is my new go-to bra for strapless needs or not. Stays in place, holds the girls where they should be, gives a glattering silhouette with clothes and the benefit of no straps to have to deal with. Although I could put them on for regular tops or dresses but I haven't bothered so far. It's been great for travel too as I know it will work with everything. I'm a plus size and these things (good fitting bras) are not any easy find! Will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: azmissdaisyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRA EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best strapless bra I have tried on EVER!!! It has extraordinary support and does not feel like a strapless bra because it does not slip down. It actually feels like a push up bra; that is how much support you get. Finding a well fitting 32G has been the bane of my adult existence, worse yet to find it in a supportive strapless. This bra has given me the freedom to wear strapless dresses and tops with spaghetti straps, which I haven't done in over 10 years. THANK YOU WACOAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: angel_jpb

customer_reviews.title: A Bra for The Bust of Us
customer_reviews.text: I'm a busty girl, and it's almost impossible to find a strapless bra that doesn't bulge, bunch, or overflow despite it being the "correct" size. I got the 44DD in Sand, and it's a perfect fit. It barely feels like I'm wearing a bra at all, and it stays in place perfectly thanks to the sticky/glue/whatever that stuff is along the top and bottom edges of the band AND cups. I highly recommend this bra for any woman who needs a larger size that actually works the way it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coates

customer_reviews.title: Real support
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 32i or 34 h.. I ordered the 34h because the 32i was not available. It fits great! It is in the tightest row of hooks so I’m concerned it will be too loose later. Stays where it belongs, no tugging at it the whole time..... even at 34h.. if your between sizes, def order the smaller band with the larger cup. I am amazed at how comfortable it is. I’m so happy to be able To Wear pretty spaghetti straps Again!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Great for full breasts, supportive, stays up
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 34DD breasts that are full all around with side tissue. The 4-hook and boning kept the bra up for 6 hours comfortably with no adjustments during that time. I forgot I was wearing it. Very comfy. Cup shape is good without minimizing too much. The sturdy mesh back breathed great. Excellent overall. If the cup shape were a little more alluring and the cups didn't crease so easy I'd give it a 5, but that's ok for the comfort and peace of mind I got. I normally wear Panache Porcelain Plunge 34DD if that helps anyone, and the Panache strapless bras didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Potter Bosky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bra!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bra because I needed a strapless nude bra to wear under my bridesmaid's dress for my brother's wedding a little over a month ago. I was pleasantly surprised because this bra was really comfortable and it gave me the support I needed - not to mention it had no problems staying up. I never had to pull it up once I put it on. The band is wide but it was able to stay hidden under my rather low-cut back dress. Size was absolutely perfect as well and it came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: The Quast’s

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bra for Busty Gals!
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooooooo happy I found a strapless bra that fits AND is comfortable! I have shamefully worn a strapless bra that's way too tiny for me for years. Though, I only wear it on rare occasions, it was always very uncomfortable. This bra fit perfectly - I followed the measurement guidelines and suggestions from others. It stays up with no need to constantly adjust. And, I felt supported. As soon as I put it on, I forgot I was wearing a strapless bra. This one is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Know your size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra. I even got the wrong size but it still fits and is comfortable as long as I sit up straight with shoulders pulled back. Otherwise, like all my bras, the top of the cup is hollow and it feels weird. I had been wearing a 38D. Turns out I should have been wearing a 36DD. And what a difference the correct bra size makes in everyday life!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get the hype...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone seems to love this bra...I don’t get the hype. I thought it was uncomfortable (like most strapless bras are)- not that great at all. Nothing special & expensive considering those things. I tried in several sizes looking for the perfect fit & at best it was “meh”
customer_reviews.author: Cr C

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra for the large busted woman!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this strapless/convertible bra! Being a very large breasted woman, I appreciate a bra that keeps my girls in place! This bra does not slip, does not bind, and keeps my girls upright and pointed out exactly as I wish they always would be! Darn gravity, good thing this broad takes care of the gravity factor. I would certainly and will certainly buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said this was an amazing lifting strapless bra. I would say it is a good bra but not spectacular or in any way ultra lifting like so many reviews. Having said that- I think it is flexible enough for lasting wear and supportive that you don’t need to re-adjust too often. 38D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never liked a strapless bra as the 42C I am, but I saw many positive reviews for this so I tried it and let me say - WOW. So comfortable, keeps the girls elevated which is damn near impossible with my size and previous strapless bras. Comes with detachable straps to make it work for you in different styles which is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: kgard011

customer_reviews.title: A straples bra that works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brawl with lots of hesitation and a disbelief in the reviews... I was wrong I think that this actually works it fits I’m the right size one ordering I don’t have to make any adjustments to my sizing and it is actually very comfortable. I have not one for extended times and if I have any change my opinion I will update my review. I am so excited for all those outfits I have not been able to wear because I did not have a strapless bra I could rely on
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great for big bust but does have minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: This bra is perfect. Too perfect. I will maybe order more, but here is pros and cons. Pros: fits so perfect I forgot I had large breasts. Great quality material Seamless even though wired Easy on and off. This specific color is excellent under clothing Cons: Wire moved as expected, and is now starting to come out of where it's poking holes. Still recommend if you especially need it for a special ocassion or a strapless item. Comes with detached straps. 4 stars because it is great, but not perfect. I will update reviews if I decide to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Technigasm

customer_reviews.title: Best and only strapless bra I need
customer_reviews.text: I have never previously worn strapless bras because I have always had issues with them staying up. When I read the reviews for this bra I was a little skeptical, and I needed a strapless bra to wear under a bridesmaid dress so I decided to give this a go. Can I just say, IT IS AMAZING! I wore it the entire day through the ceremony, reception and after party and I can honestly say it did not budge. I didn't even remember I was wearing a strapless bra because I didn't have to tug on it one bit. Amazing and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 36B, so not much to work with, but it kept it all together
customer_reviews.text: Went bridesmaid dress shopping and ended up wearing the bra, completely strapless, all day. It was as comfortable as a strapless bra can be and remained where it was meant to for the whole day. To be fair I am not the main target for this bra, I have less to be kept under control than the average girl, but I imagine it would work very well for others who are more well endowed.
customer_reviews.author: MEngels

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike strapless bras and based on reviews thought this one might be different but it feels just like any other strapless bra I have bought but much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Morse

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra I've had!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this bra did not steer me wrong this time... Best strapless bra I've tried. The fit was perfect, it doesn't budge, and it's so comfortable. Offers really great support - I often wear this even when I don't need a strapless bra because it's so comfortable - no straps digging into my shoulders but still keeps everything up! After going through so many disappointing strapless bras, the search is over!
customer_reviews.author: sweetdanger

customer_reviews.title: Not super comfortable but better than cheap strapless bras
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34/36 DD but maybe i'm actually between sizes because this bra wasn't anything special and kinda dug into my rib cage like strapless bras usually do. It does the job but it's nothing amazing. I wouldn't say it's flattering but it holds them up. I am not excited when I have to wear this but it get's the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless Bra I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 40's and in between a 34D and 34DD. I'm 5' 10" and about 160 lbs. My girls aren't huge, but gravity and having kids has had an effect for sure. I ordered the 34D and it fits great. Bra comfortably stays in place without having to be constantly tugged up, and it doesn't create the "extra boob" in the armpit area. The silhouette is smooth and flattering under clothes. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bra based on the reviews and I am so happy I did. The fit is awesome. I brought my regular size. There is no need to buy a cup bigger or small. I plan to buy two more. I can now wear beautiful shirts and dresses without having to see and/or fix bra straps. You won't be disappointed if you buy this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST STRAPLESS BRA I'VE EVER OWNED... AND I'VE OWNED A LOT
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable strapless bra ever!!! I showed it to my colleague at work, while I was wearing it :) It is comfortable and stays in place. I wore it all day at work and did not have to tug, yank or adjust it one time, terrific!!!
customer_reviews.author: AKM Roopchan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Good support, but omg it is so uncomfortable I could not imagine wearing it for an entire event. I opted for a stretchy bandeau style bra and even though it doesn’t have the support, I’d trade that for the comfort and lack of back rolls any day.
customer_reviews.author: CMI

customer_reviews.title: Wow - What a marvelous bra!
customer_reviews.text: I am very top heavy and normally cannot wear anything that requires a strapless bra. After reading the many reviews, I decided to give this bra a try, and I am so glad I did. I'm normally between a 36D and 36DD cup, and I ordered a 36D. It fits perfectly, and actually looks better than my regular bras. I love this bra and it is so comfortable - stays where you put it as well! Buy this strapless bra in your regular size, you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallori Andrews

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bra....
customer_reviews.text: This bra is fantastic. the sticky (not glue sticky) lines along the bra help to keep "the girls" in place. I didn't believe it would do the job; but after trying it out I am very pleased. I am 65+ and wear 40C. I also bought clear straps via Amazon that fits this bra, so it looks great with small strapped tops. I would recommend to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: IT_IrishTechie =)

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless Bra EVER
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 34DD, and I've always had difficulty finding a good bra fit, let alone a good *strapless* bra fit. After 20+ years of searching, I'd reconciled myself to always having to wear a half-jacket with my sleeveless dresses/tops. But finally, I discovered this bra, and it fits perfectly!!!! It doesn't need constant readjustment like every other strapless bra I've tried, considering it has 4 hooks in the back the band stays 100% in place all day long. It also doesn't give the dreaded saggy-boobs affect that most unsupportive strapless bras give me; it keeps things supported and pushed up, but I'm not spilling out of the top either. I absolutely love this bra!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Where do I start?
customer_reviews.text: The cups were just all wrong. They cut into breast tissue at the top and gapped like crazy on the bottom. And I don't know if the band was cut weird or what because the top of the gore dug into the middle of my sternum so hard that it started to push out the bottom of the wires even though the band was tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great bra!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra, i'm usually either a 38g/h or 40g. The 40 g fit perfectly. I haven't worn a strapless bra in years because they had always been awful. This worked great and was comfortable to wear all day. It has rubber non slip lining which I don't event notice when I'm wearing. It comes with detachable straps. The straps are REALLY stretchy, so they don't do much. I wish the straps were sturdier. I just ordered this bra last minute for an event and hoped for the best, but now I'll probably buy more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Aurial

customer_reviews.title: Wife Likes
customer_reviews.text: Listened to reviews and ordered 1 cup size larger for my wife. Bad idea. Way to big. Wound up ordering 3 other sizes and eventually found the right size. 36C. She is normally a 36 c or D. She can now wear her little blouses with the thin straps.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Darn underwires
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers the underwire had popped out.. before I even opened the box. I would have returned it for another but I needed it the next day, so I just sewed it up. Other than that it fits great! It holds me up while still providing cleavage. Ok update: I wore this for an entire night and I never had to adjust it! I am upping this review to five stars because even though I had to do a minor sewing job, the support and shape that this bra provides more than makes up for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Demirci

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this bra (needed up size up after kids). This is unlike any other strapless bra I have ever tried and completely worth the money. It does not slip, you will not be pulling it up all might. Larger sizes do have additional hooks in the back as an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: MGK

customer_reviews.title: Wacoal's a good brand
customer_reviews.text: I used to work in the intimates department so it's a pretty solid purchase. I think mine was a little too small, but returning it is too much grief and I have an extender anyway, so I'll just be doing that. Holds well, beautiful deep nude color and of true Wacoal quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce Emmalin Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Bra
customer_reviews.text: I am so blown away by how well this bra fits! I'm a 38DD and strapless bras have never been comfortable. This one is so comfortable! No extra padding, just support. There is boning in the sides to prevent roll up when you sit down and four hooks in the back to make you feel secure. Would highly recommend this to my large busted ladies looking to enjoy some strappy tops/dresses
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Well made- awesome bra
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made bra. Cannot go wrong with this brand. Stays put, flattering. Perfect fit, in a 36c. Will work with many outfits where strapless bra is needed. A staple for wardrobe- did I mention it is comfortable as well?
customer_reviews.author: laura k

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and gives good support
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite strapless bra hands down. It stays up and is very comfortable and provides good support, plus it creates a nice neckline. I have not used a strapless ever that looked good and felt comfortable enough even if I wasn’t wearing something sleeveless and this one is not like that. It is pricey but I definitely use it and it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting, most comfortable strapless bra I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bra and tried a less expensive bra too. This Wacoal strapless bra fit perfectly and there was no gap at the top at all. I had a smooth fit under my clothing. But more than anything, I wore it comfortably all day and into the evening and didn't need to adjust it one time, which I found amazing. To me, it was worth the extra cost. The less expensive bra probably would have worked fine but I could see right away it didn't fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit, slipped down a lot
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the proportions of this bra are great. I ordered the correct size (34D) and found that it really dragged my breasts down. If I pulled it up as high as it likely should have been, the wire between my breasts really dug in. It does have a rubbery material around it to help hold it up, but I found the cup placement in relation to the band to not be comfortable or flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! A strapless bra for bigger boobs that actually works! I went to Florida for a week for my sister's wedding, so that was a lot of different dresses I had to wear in humid weather. I wore this bra 3 nights in a row and I forgot it was even there! It was super comfortable and...I didn't need to pull it up at all! I am a 34DDD so it is hard to find supportive and comfortable bras in general but I was really impressed with this one! If you need a strapless bra and are on the fence on this one...JUST GET IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The perfect strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra was recommended to me by a friend with the review that it was "her favorite stapless bra". I have to say, the fit has exceeded my expectations and opened the door to outfits that I would otherwise be unable to pull off, given my chest size. It actually STAYS US and has great coverage. For anyone who has written-off ever being able to wear a strapless dress b/c of their chest size... buy this bra!
customer_reviews.author: KKP

customer_reviews.title: Great support for heavy chest
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a strapless bra that supported my heavy chest until now! I am a 36DDD, went with a 36G based on reviews and it was perfect. Buy the bra!
customer_reviews.author: Britney S

customer_reviews.title: Went through 3 other bras and picked this one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34DD - big bobs, small waist and strapless bras are my enemy. Except for this one. It fit nice though at first I was a little worried it wouldn't stay, but the longer I wore it the more comfortable it felt and I didn't have my attention on it. Now, I wouldn't go line dancing in it, but for an evening out it was perfect! It had some support and separation - so no uniboob going on. However, it definitely doesn't fit like a push up bra which is perfect for me but others who want more lift might not like.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Mom Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays in Place, Fits Well!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this brought after reading all of the glowing reviews and I must say, it does what everybody says. This bra stays in place, doesn’t slide down like so many others and doesn’t seem to dig into your back. I did order up one band size based on other reviews and that was a smart move. It stays where it supposed to and doesn’t suffocate me. It’s definitely a worthy addition to my bra drawer, even if it is rather costly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spodnick

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a good reliable strapless bra and I think I have found the one. When you are bigger up top it can be hard to find a good one that will give you the necessary support that you need. I'm a 34DD and this held up comfortably all day. It didn't fall down, move or pinch. Would definitely recommend but make sure you get your true size. I went with nude so I could wear it with different colored outfits.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: padded wires keeps larger bust lifted and in place
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, good padding over the wire. Comfortable straps soft silky material that is still durable and effective at lifting. True to fit I am busty, This frog kept everything lifted word should be. Congratulations for making a good bra
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Blows my mind
customer_reviews.text: My second time buying this bra (first time I bought it at Nordstrom) this it the best strapless bra I've ever bought. Never had a strapless give so much support! Now I cant wear certain clothing styles with confidence
customer_reviews.author: Janee W.

customer_reviews.title: Try it out! I'm sure you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down the best strapless I've ever tried on and the only one I own now. I'm a 32E and it does a great job of keeping the girls in place while doing normal activities. This isn't my favorite bra for a long day's wear and maybe a 8 out of 10 for comfort but again, it's by far the best strapless I've had. It hasn't slipped and I don't have to adjust it over and over again. It holds it shape well and offers great support for a strapless.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: but if you want one very good strapless bra for various types of clothing (off-the-shoulder shirts
customer_reviews.text: I actually jumped up and down while wearing this bra (40D), and the bra kept everything in place. I would've thought I needed a winch and a come-a-long to keep my girls up, but this foundation garment did the trick. Now, it costs a war pension, for sure, but if you want one very good strapless bra for various types of clothing (off-the-shoulder shirts, spaghetti straps, etc), this is it. It comes with detachable straps also. I am glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: BedfordFalls

product_meta.title: Wacoal Women's Red Carpet Strapless Full Busted Underwire Bra
product_meta.description: Red carpet full figure strapless bra that stays put. Hand wash warm, Wash colors separately, Use non-chlorine bleach only when needed, Hang to dry, Do not iron, Do not dry clean
feature_bullets: Strapless bra with contoured cups featuring sweetheart neckline and removable straps
Cushioned lower bottom band for added comfort
Cushioned lower bottom band for added comfort
Cushioned lower bottom band for added comfort
